title: What is science education for? - Quora

response.answer_text: It teaches young minds the benefits, the history, and the journey of many branches of scientific inquiry and knowledge. How with each improvement in scientific knowledge, the quality of human life improved. It explains and elaborates the scientific method, which is the best tool humans have devised to test assumptions, formulate hypotheses, create experiments to probe the natural world, discover new facts, and add knowledge for the benefit of all people. It shows us how we might one day add to the growing body of knowledge. And it inspires us to do exactly that.

To help people understand what science is and how it works, and maybe to find people who have an interest in and talent for science. The reason our lives are so vastly different from these peoples’ live is mostly due to science.

Science education is an area that focuses on sharing scientific content and processes with individuals who are traditionally not considered part of the scientific community. The learner may be a child, college student or adult in the general public; the field of science education includes scientific content, scientific processes (scientific methods), some social sciences and some teaching and teaching. The Science Education Standards provide students with expectations throughout the K-12 education curriculum and beyond. The traditional themes included in the standard are physics, life, earth, space and humanities.

Science is about seeking evidence prior to acceptance, and it is about accepting the truth if evidence in found. If we accept without evidence/proof, then it lead to superstition and dogmas , which is unscientific. And if we deny despite the proof, then we have believed in falsehood, and then we become ignorant.

Reason is one of the main differences between humans and our fellow animals. Humans use vastly more reason than other animals while remaining emotional creatures. Science is the most effective application of reason ever devised. Thus teaching science is teaching people the highest human excellence. It helps move us farther up from our fellow animals.

To educate you about science. This allows you to discard medieval beliefs and understand basic facts like evolution, vaccination and earth curvature, as well as the methods used to prove these as fact, rather than an act of faith.

Science is the universal subject that spans the branch of knowledge that examines the structure and behaviour of the physical and nature world through observation and experiment. It is quite fun. Hope this helps you.
